title: Boris Johnson hugs Trump close — for now
text:
“Trump is such a maverick and such an operator with the media that I think we’re feeling quite cautious about engaging too much. He can blow up in your face,” one senior government figure said. “Clearly we have got to maintain the relationship because the U.S. is a very important ally. But we need to remain close to the U.S. not close to Donald Trump.”…

But behind the scenes Team Johnson are aware Trump is always eyeing his own electoral gain.

“He is not focused on the relationship; he’s focused on getting reelected,” the senior government figure said. “He is always in that mode. So we just need to be very careful about how we engage.”
